entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
